title: WM Underboss

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Perform the ~~factional Mafia~~ kill each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you perform the ~~factional Mafia~~ kill, you may choose to buff your attack or your defense.

- When you buff your attack, you will instead have a Powerful attack.

- When you buff your defense, you will gain Basic defense.

- You may only buff your attack or your defense four times in total.

desc:
Post 1282
Except its attack is Powerful and also does not use the factional kill and also appears as a jailor to jailed players
